metadata.name: Touch Suspicious Service File
metadata.comment: Detects usage of the "touch" process in service file.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/touch')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -t ')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.service')))

output.summary: Detects usage of the "touch" process in service file.

metadata.objective: False positive: Admin changing date of files. References: https://blogs.blackberry.com/, https://twitter.com/Joseliyo_Jstnk/status/1620131033474822144
